verbs.description: sweet potato cobbler my grandmother [V: used] to make the best sweet potato cobbler but like many cooks she did n't follow a recipe i tried many cobbler recipes before i discovered this one it a favorite for church dinners and is a special treat at home potato sweet potato dot
